00046    function getPermissions($roleRef,$getNamedIds=true)
00047    {
00048                 $roleId = $this->getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00049                 if ( ! $roleId )
00050                 {
00051                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::role::getPermissions : invalid role reference '$roleRef'.");
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 if ($getNamedIds === null)
00055                 {
00056                         return $this->db->getAllRows("
00057                                 SELECT
00058                                         p.*
00059                                 FROM 
00060                                         `{$this->permission->table}` as p,
00061                                         `{$this->table_link_roles_permissions}` as l
00062                                 WHERE
00063                                         p.`{$this->permission->key_id}` = l.`{$this->permission->foreignKey}`
00064                                         AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00065                         "); 
00066 
00067                 }
00068                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows("
00069                         SELECT
00070                                 p.`{$this->permission->key_id}` as id,
00071                                 p.`{$this->permission->key_namedId}` as namedId
00072                         FROM 
00073                                 `{$this->permission->table}` as p,
00074                                 `{$this->table_link_roles_permissions}` as l
00075                         WHERE
00076                                 p.`{$this->permission->key_id}` = l.`{$this->permission->foreignKey}`
00077                                 AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00078                 ");
00079                 
00080                 $result = array();
00081                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00082                 {
00083                         $result[] = $getNamedIds ? $row['namedId'] : (int) $row['id'];
00084                 }
00085                 return $result;
00086    }   
00087 
00093    function getByUserId($userId = null)
00094    {
00095                 
00096                 $result = array();
00097                 $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table_link_user_roles} ";
00098                 if ( ! is_null ( $userId ) )
00099                 {
00100                         $userIdList = implode (",", (array) $userId );
00101                         $sql .= "WHERE `{$this->user->foreignKey}` IN ($userIdList)";
00102                 }
00103                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows($sql);
00104                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00105                 {
00106                         $userId = $row[$this->user->foreignKey];
00107                         $roleId = $row[$this->foreignKey];
00108                         $result[$userId][] = $roleId; 
00109                 }
00110                 
00111                 return $result;
00112    }
